name: Betedo
description:
Betedo is a young company located in Lviv. We specialize in innovative IT solutions, consulting, and development of complex software systems. We provide a wide range of IT-services in Ukraine and Europe. We have high-level programmers, designers, and computer experts of various areas among us. We also have individuals who specialize in process management skills and are, therefore, able to work smoothly, which is a significant advantage in creating a large-scale project.
As a result of all of this, we make efficient solutions and create perfect software products, satisfying current and long-term needs of our customers.
Our services include custom software development, software for companies from different industries. We also offer mobile application development (Android, iOS, Windows Phone), including the development of games. Additionally, we provide technical support, website development, and SEO audit.
